markdownRemark.html: Physics is the field I wishedthat I have deep dived more when I was younger. I now see the implications of knowing the boundaries of everything we are and the universe. It all comes down to atoms and molecules interacting at the quantum level to create all the trees and the stars, the oceans and the corals, us and the world around us.
